author: SteveL-MSFT
body: These cmdlets currently depend on named pipes on Windows.  We need to support these on non-Windows.

comments.author: KirkMunro
comments.body: I hope you guys can get this working on Linux/macOS. At this weeks PowerShell and DevOps Summit, I demoed my debugging talk entirely on macOS, except for this part, for which I had to switch over to Windows.

title: port Get-PSHostProcessInfo and Enter-PSHostProcess cmdlets to non-Windows
